values:
you know what's a funny word?














periwinkle.
http://forever-fateful.livejournal.com/5371.html

Of course it's a good day. Why wouldn't it be? Lyman, the Fitness teacher, nearly killed me for a 10 minute mile--and that's not very good, at that. I reckon I'll be able to get to 6-7 minutes by the end of the trimester. And by then... I can run anywhere in PO, with no need for a liscence. Yay for practical thinking! :D

Me and the missus have been at odds and ends lately. She's been thinking, and pretty much ignoring me for whatever reason of hers. Apparently she did something so awful she can't even speak with me anymore. That makes me sad.

I put her on my binder today. Three pictures from when she was over for that beautiful week. And (Intoxication) Pained Lovely, which I found to be most fitting for the picture of us smiling together, (poem I wrote, for those that do not know.) Jamie said "DAMN!" several times when I was showing the binder to Trevor, explaining "this is Ayla, my girlfriend who came over during the summer." Everyone was suprised I had a beautiful girlfriend, I suppose, even though they covered their suprise horribly. What do you expect when you look like me? -sigh- I was going to ask her to call me, but with the way she's been treating me lately, I doubt she'd even wish to speak with me.

At any rate, I stole Will's binder to be able to put Ayla on it, so it's for a good cause. (And now it is my binder.) I also stole his fork. :|

That's what you get for letting me use you for your internet and frienship, you rotten bastard. I hope you never find your fork.
http://forever-fateful.livejournal.com/4502.html

just got back from Kid's. Well, actually... I got back a couple hours ago. But anyway, I had fun. Yes. Had fun. Probably going to end up sneaking my happy butts over there at 2-3 AM sometime tonight. Meh.
http://forever-fateful.livejournal.com/4144.html

"98% of the teenage population has tried pot. If you're part of the 2% that hasn't, copy this into your journal."

Hm. Talking to Mellie right now. I'm going to be doing some sprites and stuff for her, probably just for fun nostalgia. Gotta love the love-hate that iDraw3 gives ya, no? It crashes when you try to open .png files 30% of the time! woooo!!
http://forever-fateful.livejournal.com/3909.html

Ayla's gone. Took her to the airport today, and I miss her already. She's probably in Denver at the moment waiting for her flight to the Jackson Hole I hear about. I turned off the fan, closed the window, and closed the door in the guest room so I could keep her smell in there as long as possible. I love her smell, and I feel bad it's not going to be around soon. She had gotten me Diary by Chuck Palahniuk (Fight Club, Choke) earlier this week, and I intend to read it. I wish I could hold her still.
http://forever-fateful.livejournal.com/3705.html

Ayla's leaving tomorrow. I'm such a sad panda. :/ Looking at her right now. She wants to kiss me, hold on. ..................................................... Kay. She's wearing Marilyn. Oh yeah--Ken came over to meet the Ayla for a few mins, which was indeed the sort-of fun, although Ayla was a bit shy. I would be, I suppose, but Ken is a master conversationalist and we had a jolly good small-talk. Indeed.
http://forever-fateful.livejournal.com/3443.html

Ayla's here, now. I woke up before her because I felt like it, even though she set her alarm (the one from my room she borrowed) so she could wake up earlier. But alas, Jake prevails. I have to sleep in my parents' room while she's here. XD Makes sense, I guess, since being in the room with her makes me want to have sex, et cetera. It's really amazing having her here--and just having her touch. Hm--We were going to go on a walk this morning, and she should be up in ten minutes to get ready, so wish me luck on the walk, I guess, even though by the time my friends read this, it'll have happened. I was going to intro Ayla to a few of my friends. Probably just Nick and Ken whenever we decide to go to the movies. It'd be a big deal if you two did, even if just for a "hi" and "what's up". Anyway, time to go do something productive. (This is the first time I'm willingly stepping away from the computer, yes.)
http://forever-fateful.livejournal.com/3109.html

found this quiz thinger on Ayla's blog, so I stole it. Thought I'd spare the rest of you from being forced to ignore or post about both the quiz and my other post.
Your love is... by ChibiMarronchan
Your name is...
Your kiss is...breath taking
Your hugs are...friendly
Your eyes...burn into my heart
Your touch is...awakening my heart
Your smell is...amazing
Your smile is...encouraging
Your love is...everlasting
Quiz created with MemeGen!
http://forever-fateful.livejournal.com/3069.html

I'm back from vaca. Ayla is getting here tomorrow, yippy skippy. Got an e-mail from Ken saying that he wanted to talk to me when I get back, but seeing as it's 12 AM I'm not going to call him right now. I'll call him tomorrow before I pick up Ayla, because after that, I'm going to forget about it. I'm really excited, of course. If only I looked better for tomorrow. (Well, rather... TODAY, only... later today.)
http://forever-fateful.livejournal.com/2794.html

I am at my friend Ken's house. And he's eating pizza rolls. Right in front of me. I want some too. But I'd have to get up to get them. OMG. I am hungry. And I miss Ayla. I should talk to her later. And now he is talking while I am typing and I haven't messed up yet. I am so cool. OMG. Coke. Mmm. My mom said that I say "mmm" too much today. Ah well. I just kinda shrugged. Same old--me son. And I'm not making sense, now. Ah well. I <3 you Ayla. I hope we can talk soon, but this weekend is really busy. =( Mmm. Hopefully you can occupy yourself like I have people occupying me. Wish ya well. *muah*
http://forever-fateful.livejournal.com/2548.html

I suppose it's somewhat interesting that I never post on this damned thing. Wait--it's quite the opposite... because there's never anything here! So, I am posting to remedy this. Should I state the obvious here? Mm--yes. I like stating the obvious, because then there is no idiots in the circle. =) Ho... boy. This week is almost-finals week. I have a certification test; Windows 2003 Server. Oi. It's a pain in the ass, and I have to get back into studying today, tomorrow, and Tuesday, before the actual test rolls around on Wednesday. Mm--talking to special someone. I <3 her. Mmm.
http://forever-fateful.livejournal.com/2132.html
been a long while. Been gone for reasons of my own but back again, as you see. Things went well today, but I'm just going to shorten this post to "hey I'm back yay".
http://forever-fateful.livejournal.com/1808.html

Oh my gosh-today was horrible. Everyone wanted to touch me-it was wierd. (well not everyone, as that's an exaggeration, but you get the jest.) I show up at school and I just sit out on the bleachers by the football field because I'm thinking of her-like to be alone when that happens. Cleans stuff up and keeps things clear. Anyway, later on, in second period, this girl keeps trying to poke me in the face. We go at it for about 5 minutes, her trying to poke me, and me slapping her wrists away. Then on the way home this girl kept trying to slap me-I think she just liked my touch. I kinda hurt her without trying, though; I wasn't meaning to. I was slapping her back lightly, too. (not in the face, you wife-abusing approvers.) Yeah-that was my day.
http://forever-fateful.livejournal.com/1773.html

Kinda sick today. Got this weight in my brain like I have to go to sleep but it's not letting me. Just making me suffer. I can't talk to her as much as I would like. If I could, I would talk to her with every free moment, I think. Finished up my project that's due tomorrow. Yay. Yippe freakin skippy. Nothing else is happening. Oh! How can I forget? Got a letter from an agent today. Probably who is going to be representing me. As long as I can find $450 lying around. Jesus. That's a lot of money. Annual contracting fee-bah. It's a necessary evil.
http://forever-fateful.livejournal.com/1489.html

Random stories begin:

	So me an' my bro were washin' and shinin' mah pop's Dodge 'n shit, right? So some punk pizza guy shows up and says, "Aww, shit... get me in on that action, forsheezy." And my mom's like, "Aw, just give us our food, cracka." And so she pays and he waves goodbye all white and shit and then he backs up into our freakin' mailbox. So my pop's like, "Aww shit cracka." Then he pops a 9 into the cracka's winshield-but I keep tellin' him to get bullets, 'cause the piece just slid off. Kinda like we iced the foo' only not, 'cause mah pops doesn't need another Juvi Officer comin' after 'im.

(let's keep in mind that none of my stories make sense are have much truth to them.)
http://forever-fateful.livejournal.com/1130.html

I can suppose that things are really wierd right now. Late arrival to school tomorrow, and an Eldridge Cleaver project to do all week. I'm talking all week, not just some of the week. All freakin' week. It's really weak. Anyway, special someone is being sad-when she shouldn't. Still can't stop thinking about her. Went to sleep with her on my mind and woke up that way too. Uncontrollable.
http://forever-fateful.livejournal.com/923.html

missed churchy this morn cause I was too tired to get up. Ah well, I guess I'll 'make up' for it by going to Bible study t'day. Been thinking of someone a LOT, and I can't get her out of my head. It's bloody impossible to do homework. The thoughts are well worth their price, I'm sure. I want to hear from her soon.
http://forever-fateful.livejournal.com/556.html
be here to welcome me as I would welcome you. Break my lonliness.
http://forever-fateful.livejournal.com/330.html
